name: Avatarfitness
body:
#ArcGIS web map schema

###Definition

The ArcGIS web map is a common specification for ArcGIS web and mobile applications.  The web map exposes functionality contained in the web/mobile APIs. Although it can be read by the web/mobile APIs, it is not created directly with the web API. It can also be read by ArcGIS Desktop and ArcGIS Explorer Desktop.


###Folders

* src folder contains all the web map schema. 

* doc folder contains markdown files for all the web map schema.

* schema2cpp folder contains scripts that generate class definition and implementation in C++ from json schema.

* tool folder contains a python script that converting a JSON schema file to a markdown file.

###Getting Started

* [Web Map](things.md)


###High level web-map objects

* [operationalLayer](https://devtopia.esri.com/runtimecore/webmap-schema/blob/master/doc/operationalLayer/operationalLayer_schema.md)

* [baseMapLayer](https://devtopia.esri.com/runtimecore/webmap-schema/blob/master/doc/baseMapLayer/baseMapLayer_schema.md)

* [domain](https://devtopia.esri.com/runtimecore/webmap-schema/blob/master/doc/domain/domain_schema.md)

* [geometry](https://devtopia.esri.com/runtimecore/webmap-schema/blob/master/doc/geometry/geometry_schema.md)

* [renderer](https://devtopia.esri.com/runtimecore/webmap-schema/blob/master/doc/renderer/renderer_schema.md)

* [Source](https://devtopia.esri.com/runtimecore/webmap-schema/blob/master/doc/source/source_schema.md)

* [spatialReference](https://devtopia.esri.com/runtimecore/webmap-schema/blob/master/doc/spatialReference/spatialReference_schema.md)

* [symbol](https://devtopia.esri.com/runtimecore/webmap-schema/blob/master/doc/symbol/symbol_schema.md)
